1.0.name: wordpress/wp-get
1.0.description:
WP Get allows you to display content in posts dynamically, based on URL parameters. You can use the 'get' shortcode to display content depending on whether a particular parameter is or is not set, or what value it is set to. You can use the 'get_param' shortcode to output the value of a parameter.

See the plugin documentation to learn how to use this plugin.
